description:
Some of these items are avialab now, find them on Amazon: https://lon.tv/vsh3u (compensated affiliate links) - I took a quick trip to Berlin Germany in search of some new gadgets. Like these videos? See hours more here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIsE4lfMMLeFqP3iDDbQqkr4 and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s
